title: Bournemouth’s Joshua King joins Everton star Romelu Lukaku as his club’s all-time top Premier League goal scorer after his stunning West Ham hat-trick
text:
EFL King Joshua Bournemouth’s Joshua King joins Everton star Romelu Lukaku as his club’s all-time top Premier League goal scorer after his stunning West Ham hat-trick 
Check out your top flight team's all-time and current leading scorer, including Robbie Fowler and Thierry Henry Feature
